about_the_game:
Manufactured from 1988 until 1989 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Poland, although many(if not all) were modernised. They are 26,8m in length, sit on Gorlitz VI bogeys with disk brakes, have a top speed of 120km/h and are present in other countries also, such as Romania, Czech Republic and Germany.

Pack includes:

*12 classic doubledecker cars with photorealistic textures

*Full PBR textures

*3 different kinds of train-end signs

*Brakeshoe option (does not affect the braking sequence, only for visual effect)

*Animated couplers & air hoses and sounds

*3 levels of buffer contact sounds

*Up to 6 levels of LOD

*Doors that open/close via Properties tab or when loading/unloading passengers plus sounds

*Disable Physics option

*Custom bogeysounds

*Custom realistic full interior(lower deck, middle and upper deck)

*Interior & exterior nightmode

*Editable destination boards with text fields for departure station, destination station, via station
detailed_description:
Manufactured from 1988 until 1989 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Poland, although many(if not all) were modernised. They are 26,8m in length, sit on Gorlitz VI bogeys with disk brakes, have a top speed of 120km/h and are present in other countries also, such as Romania, Czech Republic and Germany.

Pack includes:

*12 classic doubledecker cars with photorealistic textures

*Full PBR textures

*3 different kinds of train-end signs

*Brakeshoe option (does not affect the braking sequence, only for visual effect)

*Animated couplers & air hoses and sounds

*3 levels of buffer contact sounds

*Up to 6 levels of LOD

*Doors that open/close via Properties tab or when loading/unloading passengers plus sounds

*Disable Physics option

*Custom bogeysounds

*Custom realistic full interior(lower deck, middle and upper deck)

*Interior & exterior nightmode

*Editable destination boards with text fields for departure station, destination station, via station

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
